official_title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to extend the limitation on actions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fair Credit Reporting Act Limitations on Actions Act of 2001

summary.text: Fair Credit Reporting Act Limitations on Actions Act of 2001 - Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to extend the statute of limitations from the period that is within two years from the date on which the liability arises to the period that is before the end of the three-year period beginning on the date by which the violation giving rise to the liability is discovered or reasonably should have been discovered by the consumer.

titles.title: Fair Credit Reporting Act Limitations on Actions Act of 2001
To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to extend the limitation on actions, and for other purposes.
